content.body: Hey all, Aki still manages the DNS record for TC39.es and wants to hand it over because it is getting lots of hits and costing her money.

ok so this is just for the DNS server, not domain transfer?

I don‚Äôt remember. It‚Äôs on my route53 account. Presumably because we didn‚Äôt want to have to email Istvan and wait for weeks every time someone wanted to add a subdomain?
